configurable.i18n_description: The Slimmy Colour weft Cabernet is our slim, straight leg casual trouser for men constructed in A very expensive brand’s trend-savvy Cabernet with coloured turn-up. Tailored to sit comfortably at the waist, 7FAM’s youthful Slimmy fit is slim through the hip and thigh with a slightly tapered leg and a zip fly. Set apart by the rich Cabernet colour that turns up to reveal a warm rust hue, this is a lightweight men’s trouser to satisfy stylish types who appreciate detail and difference.
configurable.i18n_description_de: Die Slimmy Colour Weft Cabernet ist unsere schmal geschnittene, legere Herrenhose mit geradem Bein im brandaktuellen Cabernet mit farbigen Aufschlägen von A very expensive brand. Die jugendliche Slimmy von 7FAM sitzt bequem in der Taille, schmal an Hüfte und Oberschenkeln und wird zum Abschluss hin noch einmal leicht enger. Mit Reißverschluss. Die leichte Herrenhose in ihrem satten Cabernet-Ton mit Aufschlägen in warmem Rostrot sind optimal für Stylebewusste, die Wert aufs Detail und das gewisse Entwas legen.
configurable.i18n_description_nl: De Slimmy Colour Weft Cabernet is onze smalle straight leg casual mannenbroek vervaardigd in A very expensive brand’s trendy Cabernet met gekleurd beleg. 7FAM’s jeugdige Slimmy zit comfortabel bij de taille, sluit strak om heup en dijbeen, loopt iets smaller toe bij de enkel en heeft een ritssluiting. Deze lichtgewicht mannenbroek in de diepe tint Cabernet en een beleg in een warme roestkleur is voor stijlvolle types die van detail en originaliteit houden.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Le Slimmy Colour Weft Cabernet est un pantalon homme slim à jambes droites décontracté réalisé dans la dernière teinte tendance Cabernet de A very expensive brand à revers colorés. D'une hauteur de taille confortable, ce Slimmy 7FAM très juvénile est étroit aux hanches et aux cuisses et ses jambes fuselées sont munies d'un zip. Outre sa superbe teinte Cabernet, qui révèle une doublure d'un beau rouille, ce pantalon léger est destiné aux hommes élégants et très attentifs aux détails.
configurable.i18n_description_it: Lo Slimmy Colour weft Cabernet è un pantalone da uomo casual, slim e a gamba dritta, realizzato nell'innovativo colore Cabernet di A very expensive brand con risvolto colorato. Concepito con caratteristiche sartoriali per una seduta comoda, lo Slimmy giovane di 7FAM ha una gamba asciutta e fondo leggermente affusolato, e chiusura a zip. Il suo tratto distintivo è l'intenso color Cabernet che sul risvolto rivela una calda tonalità ruggine. E' un pantalone leggero che soddisfa i tipi più trendy che sanno che è il dettaglio a fare la differenza.
configurable.i18n_description_es: The Slimmy Colour weft Cabernet is our slim, straight leg casual trouser for men constructed in A very expensive brand’s trend-savvy Cabernet with coloured turn-up. Tailored to sit comfortably at the waist, 7FAM’s youthful Slimmy fit is slim through the hip and thigh with a slightly tapered leg and a zip fly. Set apart by the rich Cabernet colour that turns up to reveal a warm rust hue, this is a lightweight men’s trouser to satisfy stylish types who appreciate detail and difference.

configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit: The Slimmy is our slim straight leg jean. Tailored to sit comfortably at the waist, it fits slim through the hip and thigh with a slightly tapered leg and a zip fly. This fit comes in a variety of back pocket and stitching designs.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_de: Slimmy ist unsere schmale Straight Leg Jeans. Schmal geschnitten an Hüfte und Oberschenkeln, mit schmalerer Fussweite und Reissverschluss. Dieses Modell ist mit vielen verschiedenen Taschendesigns erhältlich.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_nl: De Slimmy is onze nauw aansluitende jeans met rechte pijp. De snit zit comfortabel aan de taille en sluit nauw aan ter hoogte van heup en dij met licht toelopende pijp en ritssluiting. Deze fit is beschikbaar met allerhande designs op de achterzakken en met verschillende stiksels.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_fr: Le Slimmy est un jean droit slim. Parfaitement coupé pour reposer confortablement sur la taille, il est slim au niveau des hanches et des cuisses, tandis que les jambes sont légèrement resserrées. Il est assorti d’une fermeture zippée. Cette coupe est proposée avec divers types de poches arrière et de surpiqûres.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_it: Slimmy è un jeans con taglio slim e gamba dritta. Particolarmente comodo in vita, ha una vestibilità aderente attorno a fianchi e cosce, con gamba leggermente affusolata e chiusura a zip. Disponibile con un’ampia varietà di tasche posteriori e cuciture.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_es: The Slimmy is our slim straight leg jean. Tailored to sit comfortably at the waist, it fits slim through the hip and thigh with a slightly tapered leg and a zip fly. This fit comes in a variety of back pocket and stitching designs.
